tool_description: Plans and allocates procurement budgets across categories, suppliers, and time periods based on sales forecasts and cost targets.

target_food_cost_percentage.description: Target food cost as percentage of revenue (15-45)

emergency_reserve_percentage.description: Percentage of budget to reserve for emergencies (0-20)

projected_revenue.description: Expected revenue for the budget period

error_messages: Invalid budget amount: total_budget must be a positive number.
Invalid budget period: budget_period_days must be between 7 and 365 days.
Invalid food cost target: target_food_cost_percentage must be between 15 and 45 percent.
Invalid emergency reserve: emergency_reserve_percentage must be between 0 and 20 percent.
Budget-revenue mismatch: If projected_revenue is provided, verify that budget aligns with food cost target.
Invalid category priorities: Some categories in category_priorities are not recognized.
usage: Specify total budget and planning period. Optionally set food cost targets, category priorities, and emergency reserves. If projected revenue is provided, the tool validates budget against cost targets.

category_allocations.description: Budget categories and their allocation amounts

weekly_budgets.description: Weekly budget allocations across the planning period

cost_per_cover_target.description: Target food cost per customer served

variance_alerts.description: Warnings about budget allocations or targets
